work.summary: Future internship at Datadog during the Fall of 2025 related to distributed systems programming. Will be updated.
Internship during the summer of 2023 and 2024, with part-time work during the 2023-2024 school year
highlights: Developed a reinforcement learning agent in Pytorch for integration in an adaptive networking R&D project

Researched and implemented a decision transformer and perceiver IO model for sequence-based reinforcement learning. Compared the performance of various LLMs (GPT2, GPT3, LLAMA2) for the underlying transformer architecture
Read research papers and used legacy codebases to quickly implement experimental ideas to demonstrate proof of concept
Participated in regular scrum meetings, responsible for presenting progress demos at end-of-sprint and quarterly meetings

work.summary: Part time work at an early-stage venture, orchestrated through UPenn's Venture Initiation Program
highlights: Responsible for fixing bug tickets in the product MVP using React Typescript with Tailwind CSS and graphql
Participated in regular meetings with the startup co-founders to design and implement a product landing page

work.summary: Worked in a team of 3 to develop a new content recommendation engine for the DP's website. Responsible for training, fine-tuning, and evaluating the ML model using Gensim's Doc2Vec in Python.
Tutored AP Calculus, AP Physics, and AP Computer Science to high school students in weekly meetings within both one-on-one and group settings

featured-projects.name: PennOS
featured-projects.description: A functional Linux-style operating system written in C. Implements a shell, FAT file system, and priority-based round-robin process scheduler with user/kernel-level abstractions.

featured-projects.name: Covid Stock Analysis
featured-projects.description: A data analysis project that explores the relationship between COVID-19 and the stock market. Uses data from the COVID Tracking Project and Yahoo Finance to analyze the correlation between COVID-19 cases and stock prices.

featured-projects.name: PennBook
featured-projects.description: A Facebook-like social media web application containing user profiles, posts, chatrooms, newsfeeds, search functionality, friend networks, and infinite scrolling.

featured-projects.name: Zoogle
featured-projects.description: A search engine. Uses a web crawler, PageRank-based indexer, and custom ranking pipeline to search over 1 million web pages.

featured-projects.name: Gesture Controlled Robot
featured-projects.description: A robot controlled by custom hand gestures. Uses a publisher-subscriber model between multiple Arduino BLEs and a custom-trained ML model for gesture-classification.

featured-projects.name: kl-dfs: A Distributed File System
featured-projects.description: A distributed file system that supports file storage, retrieval, deletion, and replication across multiple servers. Uses gRPC for communication between servers and clients.

featured-projects.name: Scout
featured-projects.description: A web app that aggregates USGS and RIDB trail data to find, plan, and visualize your next outdoor backpacking trip.

featured-projects.name: Personal Website
featured-projects.description: A personal website built with Gatsby and hosted with Vercel.

featured-projects.name: Runger
featured-projects.description: An iOS app designed for fine-grain control over your interval run training. Integrates with the Apple Health app allow users to seamlessly import runs into health app.

featured-projects.name: Chat GPTerminal
featured-projects.description: A lightweight shell program for using OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model from the command line. Contains custom initializations for writing/explaining code.

featured-projects.name: Health Data Analysis
featured-projects.description: A data analysis project exploring the socioeconomic factors that influence county-level health outcomes.

featured-projects.name: Websocket Chatrooms
featured-projects.description: Currently a WIP. A websocket-based chatroom application that supports multiple chatrooms and private messaging.
